title: Balcony Breath, WhoAnon? 10.7.20
itunes:title: Balcony Breath, WhoAnon? 10.7.20
description:
In episode 731, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Alex Edelman to discuss Trump's appearance at the White House, hydroxychloroquine advocates being angry, Claudia Conway whistleblowing on TikTok, who Qanon supporters really are, and more!

FOONOTES:

  1. Trump looks like he is gasping for air
  2. Trump appears to be wincing in pain while he breathes
  3. Video: Intense Trump fan yells 'I will die for him' at Trump motorcade
  4. Dr. Fauci warns that Trump’s COVID-19 recovery could soon go into ‘reversal’
  5. Trump video from White House
  6. Hydroxychloroquine Advocates Are Pissed Trump’s Not Taking It For COVID
  7. Twitter Thinks 15-Year-Old Claudia Conway Is The Whistleblower Of Our Time
  8. Trump says stimulus relief negotiations over until after election, pulling back from aid talks
  9. QAnon Supporters Aren’t Quite Who You Think They Are
  10. WATCH: HTIEKAL ft. Git - Birds (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
